text: (Abayahudi babwira abakurikiye intumwa Muhamadi) baravuze bati "Nimube Abayahudi ni bwo muzayoboka;nAbakirisitu (babwira abakurikiye intumwa Muhamadi) bati "Mube Abakirisitu ni bwo muzayoboka". Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti "Ahubwo (ukuyoboka nyako ni ugukurikira) idini ritunganye rya Ibrahim (ritabangikanya Allah). Kandi ntiyari mu babangikanyamana
